title: About
text:
We are 4 organizers with a scientific background from different institutions. We all work or have worked on projects dealing with data-driven approaches for mapping groundwater parameters.

Ezra Haaf

Chalmers Tekniska Högskola: Gothenburg
 0000-0002-2746-0328

Tanja Liesch, Dr.

Karlsruhe Institute of Technology
 0000-0001-8648-5333

Maximilian Nölscher

Federal Institute for Geosciences and Natural Resources
 0000-0001-5606-1900

Marc Ohmer, Dr.

Karlsruhe Institute of Technology
 0000-0002-2322-335X

title: Features
text:
The following table provides relevant information about the 208 features. Either all or an arbitrary subset of features can be used for modeling.






Tip



The following features are available for multiple spatial scales:

feat_topo_eumohp_<feature name>(1, 2, 3, 4, 5)
feat_topo_amatulli_<feature name>(1km, 5km, 10km, 50km, 100km)<suffix>

So please be aware of that, when subsetting features!

title: Groundwater Spatial Modeling Challenge 2024
text:
2024-04-15

The Groundwater Spatial Modeling Challenge 2024 officially starts today. If you are interested in participating, please check out this github repository in this github repository for all relevant information.



2024-04-10
The Groundwater Spatial Modeling Challenge 2024 is about to start in the next few days and all necessecary data will be available in this github repository



2024-01-10
The Groundwater Spatial Modeling Challenge 2024 will be announced and started in April 2024 together with the EGU conference in Vienna. Therefore, further information will follow soon and latest in April.
